>
[Natural Skill](/Feats.aspx?ID=4479) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 64 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your ingenuity allows you to learn a wide variety of skills. You gain the trained proficiency rank in two skills of your choice.
name: Natural Skill
